Message:
There was a strange world
on the other side of the hole,
and in it...was Daddy.

But, he got really surprised
when I called him that...

I don’t get why, though.
Men are “Daddy,”
and women are “Mommy.”

From then on, I started talking
with Daddy every day.

Though for some reason,
a mommy with thorns
is with him today.

Huh? I’m Mom and Dad’s child...
I wonder why she’s asking...

Oh, I know!
Since we’re doing introductions,
I’ll also introduce Pon Pon!

“My mom gave me this bear!
It’s my treasure!”

When I showed
Pon Pon to them,
Daddy smiled and said,
“That’s a lovely treasure
you’ve got there.”

After that, the mommy with
the thorns started mumbling
something as she walked away.

I wonder what’s wrong?
Well, she looked really happy,
so I guess it’s nothing!
